title: Top Places to visit in Balrampur, Chhattisgarh
content:
Balrampur is the headquarters of Balrampur-Ramanujganj district of the Indian state of Chhattisgarh. It is the administrative headquarters 441 km North of the state headquarters Raipur.
Balrampur-Ramanujganj district is a part of Ambikapur (Surguja) division. It came into existence on 1 J

title: Top Places to Visit in Balrampur, Uttar Pradesh
content:
Balrampur is a city and a municipal board in Balrampur district in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. It is situated on the bank of river Rapti and is the district headquarters of Balarampur district. Balrampur was a state in India. It is divided in 1748 and a part of U.P.
